title: E.L.M.
description: Cuban-American Penelope has always known she never quite fit in with her dysfunctional family. Her twin sister, Bianca is popular, stylish and definitely received the better blend of the family genes. Then one day, tragedy strikes her family. Pen and her siblings lose their parents, find themselves going from riches to rags and forced to live with their Tio Sebastian in North Carolina. The things that mattered before are irrelevant and Penelope finally feels like she belongs. Her dreams become reality as she finds herself in a transition from a world of glamour to one of magical phenomenon.
author: R.G. Esquivel
